questions.text: In what movie did Billy Crystal first star?
questions.explanation:
Rabbit Test.

	This 1978 movie, directed by comedienne Joan Rivers, told the story of the world's first pregnant man, who was played by Billy Crystal.

questions.text: What was the name of Billy Crystal's character on the TV show "Soap"?
questions.explanation:
Jodie Dallas.

	Jodie Dallas was television's first openly gay character.

questions.text: Billy Crystal was on "Saturday Night Live" for 3 seasons.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Billy appeared on "Saturday Night Live" from one season 1984-1985.

questions.text: What was the name of the character Billy played in the movie "Running Scared"?
questions.explanation:
Danny Costanzo.

	Gregory Hines co-starred with Billy in this 1986 movie.

questions.text: In what movie would you hear Billy say "What is my goal here, to make you a happy, well-adjusted gangster?"
questions.explanation:
Analyze This.

	Billy played Ben Sobel, M.D. in this hysterical 1999 movie opposite Robert Deniro.

questions.text: Billy appeared in the movie "The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Billy had an uncredited appearance as the mattress salesman in this 2000 movie version of the classic cartoon "Rocky and Bullwinkle".

questions.text: What three movies did Billy appeared in that were directed by Rob Reiner?
questions.correct: "This is Spinal Tap", "The Princess Bride", "When Harry Met Sally"
options: "The Princess Bride", "Sleepless in Seattle", "When Harry Met Sally"
"This is Spinal Tap", "When Harry Met Sally", "City Slickers"
questions.explanation:
"This is Spinal Tap", "The Princess Bride", "When Harry Met Sally".

	In the 1984 rockumentary "This is Spinal Tap", Billy Crystal played a mime called Morty. This movie was Rob Reiner's directorial debut.

questions.text: Billy Crystal won an Academy Award for his role in "City Slickers".
questions.explanation:
false.

	Billy played Mitch Robbins in this funny 1991 movie.  His co-star Jack Palance did win an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

questions.text: Billy Crystal directed the 1995 movie "Forget Paris".
questions.explanation:
true.

	Billy played basketball referee Mickey Gordon and co-starred opposite Debra Winger.  Billy was also the producer of the movie and co-wrote the screenplay.

questions.text: What was the name of Billy's character in the movie "The Princess Bride"?
questions.explanation:
Max & Miracle Max.

	Even though Billy's character was in one scene, it was a very memorable and entertaining scene!  Carol Kane played opposite Billy as his wife in this wonderful 1987 movie.
